Ārakkhadāyaka Thera：1．ārakkhadāyaka Thera．-An arahant．In a previous birth he built a railing （vedi） round the thūpa of the Buddha Siddhattha and made provision for its protection．Six kappas ago he was a king named Apassena．Ap．i．214-15．

2．ārakkhadāyaka Thera．An arahant．He put a fence round the thupa of the Buddha Dhammadinna and arranged for its protection．This act resulted in his becoming an arahant in the present age．Ap．i．253．
